question:
Match the columns:
(A) Amjad Ali Khan 1. Flute
(B) Ali Hussain 2. Sarod
(C) Hari Prasad Chaurasia 3. Tabla
(D) Alaa Rakha 4. Shehnai
     A B C D
explanation:
• Amjad Ali Khan Bangash is an Indian classical sarod player, best known for his clear and fast ekhara taans.
• Ali Ahmed Hussain Khan was a shehnai specialist from India. He was born in Kolkata.
• Hariprasad Chaurasia is an Indian music director and classical flutist, who play the bansuri, an Indian bamboo flute, in the Hindustani classical tradition.
• Ustad Allarakha Qureshi popularly known as Alla Rakha was an Indian tabla player specialized in Hindustani Classical music.
